channel.title: Community Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Community Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Community Mapping and Local Governance
item.description:
What you can do

  • Community issue mapping
  • Service access and planning
  • Participatory planning and reporting

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Design projects in QGIS and collaborate securely via QFieldCloud.

item.title: QField for Social Suffering and Vulnerability Mapping
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Vulnerability and needs assessments
  • Service access and infrastructure mapping
  • Community engagements and feedback

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare forms in QGIS and collaborate through QFieldCloud with clear permissions and history.
